title: We're all playing this game to have fun, so remove Ranked as a whole

replies.body: Observation: most ranked players dont play to win, they play to flex their ego.

nah

a lot of people like ranked
I need ranked for the border and summoner icon at the end of season.

Player 1: Why the fuck did you locked in Teemo jungle you dumbass

Player 2: Cus I'm trying to have fun. And I have fun with Teemo...

Player 3: Everyone report this kid

Player 4: FF15

Player 5: Everyone.... STFU and just play the game
